translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Vibhīṣaṇa
“On the bank of the Candabhāgā River,
It was filled with billa trees,
Having filled a load of bamboo,
I was satisfied, my mind uplifted.
To the hero, the field of merit,
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of giving fruit.
Welcome indeed was it to me,
The Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.
The Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.”🔽Thus the elder Billiya recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā billiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Billiyattherassāpadānaṁ tatiyaṁ.
